typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SourceSystemID as string,
		GlobalMovieID as string,
		SourceSystemMovieID as string,
		SouthridgeMovieID as string,
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		actors as string,
		title as string,
		genre as string,
		rating as string,
		runtime as string,
		releaseYear as string,
		availabilityDate as string,
		streamingAvailabilityDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['catalog.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> catalogmerged
